sentences.sentence: There is surely no animal equal to me for cleverness in the whole world!
sentences.translation: 世界上肯定没有能比得上我聪明的动物了！

sentences.sentence: Pray, with all your cleverness, why did not you manage to keep your eyes open?
sentences.translation: 你那么聪明，为什么没有放亮眼睛呢？

sentences.sentence: Psychologists have found it difficult to test Ted's cleverness because they do not have high enough scores for him.
sentences.translation: 心理学家发现，检测泰德的聪明程度是很困难的，因为测验分数上限对他来说不够高。
